interpretation: The "clockwise vertical arrows" card indicates change and progress. This is a time to move forward and embrace new opportunities. The arrows suggest a clear direction, indicating that the changes ahead are purposeful and intentional. It's important to remain adaptable and open to different paths as you navigate this transition. Trust in the natural flow of life and have faith that everything is working out for your highest good. This card also reminds us that time is a precious resource, and we should use it wisely. If you've been feeling stuck or stagnant, this card is a sign that it's time to shake things up and take action. Embrace the energy of change and trust that the universe is guiding you towards your highest potential.
